TranslationItem.Name: chkUseLocalChangesAction
TranslationItem.Source: Use last chosen "local changes" action as default action. This action will be performed without warning while checking out branch.
TranslationItem.Value: 마지막에 설정된 "언어 설정"을 기본값으로 유지합니다. 이 옵션은 브랜치 체크 아웃시 경고 없이 동작 합니다.

TranslationItem.Name: ShowAuthorGravatar
TranslationItem.Value: 작성자 대표 이미지를 gravatar.com 에서 가져오기

TranslationItem.Name: chkEnableAutoScale
TranslationItem.Source: Auto scale user interface when high DPI is used
TranslationItem.OldSource: Auto scale user interface when high dpi is used

TranslationItem.Name: chkShowCurrentBranchInVisualStudio
TranslationItem.Source: Show current branch in Visual Studio

TranslationItem.Name: chkShowRelativeDate
TranslationItem.Source: Show relative date instead of full date

TranslationItem.Name: _branchCheckoutError
TranslationItem.Source: Branch '{0}' is not selectable, this branch has been removed from the selection.
TranslationItem.Value: 브랜치 '{0}'는 선택할 수 없습니다. 이 브랜치는 없거나, 삭제 되었습니다.

TranslationItem.Name: CheckAtStartup
TranslationItem.Source: Check settings at startup (disables automatically if all settings are correct)
TranslationItem.Value: 프로그램 시작시 설정값 확인 (모든 설정값이 정상이면 자동으로 체크해제)

TranslationItem.Name: _adviceDiffToolConfiguration
TranslationItem.Source: You should configure a diff tool to show file diff in external program (kdiff3 for example).
TranslationItem.Value: 파일비교 툴 또는 외부 프로그램을 설정하세요 (kdiff3, bc3, etc...)

TranslationItem.Name: _cantRegisterShellExtension
TranslationItem.Source: Could not register the shell extension because '{0}' could not be found.
TranslationItem.Value: '{0}'을(를) 찾을수 없어 쉘확장 서비스를 등록할 수 없습니다.

TranslationItem.Name: _configureMergeTool
TranslationItem.Source: You need to configure merge tool in order to solve mergeconflicts (kdiff3 for example).
TranslationItem.Value: 파일머지/충돌처리 툴 또는 외부 프로그램을 설정하세요. (kdiff3, bc3, etc...)

TranslationItem.Name: _customMergeToolXConfigured
TranslationItem.Source: There is a custom mergetool configured: {0}

TranslationItem.Name: _emailSet
TranslationItem.Source: A username and an email address are configured.
TranslationItem.Value: 사용자 이름 및 메일이 설정되어 있습니다.

TranslationItem.Name: _gitCredentialWinStoreHelperInstalled
TranslationItem.Source: Git Credential Win Store is installed as credential helper.
TranslationItem.Value: Git Credential Win Store 가 설치 되었습니다.

TranslationItem.Name: _gitNotFound
TranslationItem.Source: Git not found. To solve this problem you can set the correct path in settings.
TranslationItem.Value: Git 실행파일을 찾을 수 없습니다. 이 문제를 해결하기 위해 정확한 Git 경로를 설정하세요.

TranslationItem.Name: _gitVersionFound
TranslationItem.Source: Git {0} is found on your computer.

TranslationItem.Name: _kdiff3NotFoundAuto
TranslationItem.Source: Path to kdiff3 could not be found automatically. Please make sure KDiff3 is installed or set path manually.
TranslationItem.Value: 자동으로 kdiff3 설치 경로를 찾는데 실패하였습니다. KDiff3가 설치되지 않았으면 설치하고, 설치되어 있으면 경로를 설정해주세요.

TranslationItem.Name: _kdiffAsDiffConfigured
TranslationItem.Value: KDiff3 가 기본 비교툴로 설정 되었습니다.

TranslationItem.Name: _kdiffAsDiffConfiguredButNotFound
TranslationItem.Source: KDiff3 is configured as difftool, but the path to kdiff.exe is not configured.
TranslationItem.Value: KDiff3 가 기본 비교툴이지만, kdiff.exe 경로가 설정되지 않았습니다.

TranslationItem.Name: _kdiffAsMergeConfigured
TranslationItem.Value: KDiff3 가 기본 머지도구로 설정 되었습니다.

TranslationItem.Name: _kdiffAsMergeConfiguredButNotFound
TranslationItem.Source: KDiff3 is configured as mergetool, but the path to kdiff.exe is not configured.
TranslationItem.Value: KDiff3 가 기본 머지도구이지만, kdiff.exe 경로가 설정되지 않았습니다.

TranslationItem.Name: _linuxToolsShNotFound
TranslationItem.Source: The path to linux tools (sh) could not be found automatically. Please make sure there are linux tools installed (through msysgit or cygwin) or set the correct path manually.

TranslationItem.Name: _linuxToolsSshFound
TranslationItem.Source: Linux tools (sh) found on your computer.

TranslationItem.Name: _linuxToolsSshNotFound
TranslationItem.Source: Linux tools (sh) not found. To solve this problem you can set the correct path in settings.
TranslationItem.Value: 리눅스 툴(sh)을 찾지 못하였습니다. 문제를 해결할려면, 정확한 경로를 설정하십시요.

TranslationItem.Name: _mergeToolXConfigured
TranslationItem.Source: There is a custom mergetool configured.

TranslationItem.Name: _mergeToolXConfiguredNeedsCmd
TranslationItem.Source: {0} is configured as mergetool, this is a custom mergetool and needs a custom cmd to be configured.
TranslationItem.Value: {0}가 머지도구로 설정 되었지만, 제대로 동작하지 않을 수 있습니다. 실행 명령어 설정을 통하여 바로 잡아 주세요.

TranslationItem.Name: _noCredentialsHelperInstalledTryGCS
TranslationItem.Source: No credential helper could be installed. Try to install git-credential-winstore.exe.
TranslationItem.Value: 인증기가 설치되지 않았습니다. git-credential-winstore.exe 파일을 설치하십시요.

TranslationItem.Name: _noDiffToolConfigured
TranslationItem.Source: There is no difftool configured. Do you want to configure kdiff3 as your difftool? Select no if you want to configure a different difftool yourself.
TranslationItem.Value: 기본 파일비교툴이 없습니다. kdiff3 툴을 기본 파일비교툴로 설정하시겠습니까? 선택하지 않을경우 다른 파일비교툴을 설정하세요.

TranslationItem.Name: _noEmailSet
TranslationItem.Source: You need to configure a username and an email address.
TranslationItem.Value: 사용자 이름과 이메일 주소를 설정해야 합니다.

TranslationItem.Name: _noLanguageConfigured
TranslationItem.Source: There is no language configured for Git Extensions.

TranslationItem.Name: _noMergeToolConfigured
TranslationItem.Source: There is no mergetool configured. Do you want to configure kdiff3 as your mergetool? Select no if you want to configure a different mergetool yourself.
TranslationItem.Value: 기본 머지도구가 없습니다. kdiff3 툴을 기본 파일비교툴로 설정하시겠습니까? 선택하지 않을경우 다른 머지도구를 설정하세요.

TranslationItem.Name: _opensshUsed
TranslationItem.Source: Default SSH client, OpenSSH, will be used. (commandline window will appear on pull, push and clone operations)
TranslationItem.Value: 기본 SSH Client, OpenSSH 가 사용됩니다. (git pull, push, clone 명령어 실행시 실행창이 잠시 보여집니다)

TranslationItem.Name: _plinkputtyGenpageantNotFound
TranslationItem.Source: PuTTY is configured as SSH client but cannot find plink.exe, puttygen.exe or pageant.exe.
TranslationItem.Value: PuTTY 가 SSH 클라이언트로 설정되었습니다만, plink.exe, puttygen.exe, pageant.exe 파일을 찾을 수 없습니다.

TranslationItem.Name: _puttyConfigured
TranslationItem.Source: SSH client PuTTY is configured properly.

TranslationItem.Name: _puttyFoundAuto
TranslationItem.Source: All paths needed for PuTTY could be automatically found and are set.
TranslationItem.Value: PuTTY 에 필요한 모든 경로가 자동으로 설정 됩니다.

TranslationItem.Name: _shCanBeRun
TranslationItem.Source: Command sh can be run using: {0}sh

TranslationItem.Name: _shellExtNeedsToBeRegistered
TranslationItem.Source: {0} needs to be registered in order to use the shell extensions.
TranslationItem.Value: 쉘확장 프로그램을 사용하기 위해서 {0} 가 레지스터리에 등록되어야 합니다.

TranslationItem.Name: _shellExtNoInstalled
TranslationItem.Source: Shell extensions are not installed. Run the installer to install the shell extensions.
TranslationItem.Value: 쉘 확장 프로그램이 설치되지 않았습니다. 설치파일을 실행하여 쉘 확장(shell extensions) 프로그램을 포함시켜 설치하세요.

TranslationItem.Name: _shellExtRegistered
TranslationItem.Value: 쉘 확장 프로그램이 정상적으로 레지스터리에 등록되었습니다.

TranslationItem.Name: _solveGitCommandFailed
TranslationItem.Source: The command to run git could not be determined automatically. Please make sure git (msysgit or cygwin) is installed or set the correct command manually.
TranslationItem.Value: Git을 사용하는 이 명령을 실행할 수 없습니다. PC에 mysysgit 또는 cygwin 이 설치되었는지 확인하거나, 실행 명령어가 정확한지 확인하세요.

TranslationItem.Name: _wrongGitVersion
TranslationItem.Source: Git found but version {0} is not supported. Upgrade to version {1} or later
TranslationItem.Value: 지원되지 않는 Git 버전 {0}을 찾았습니다. {1} 버전 또는 최신으로 업그레이드 하세요.

TranslationItem.Name: label11
TranslationItem.Source: The checklist below validates the basic settings needed for GitExtensions to work properly.

TranslationItem.Name: showContainedInBranchesRemoteIfNoLocalToolStripMenuItem
TranslationItem.Source: Show remote branches only when no local branch contains this commit

TranslationItem.Name: showContainedInBranchesRemoteToolStripMenuItem
TranslationItem.Source: Show remote branches containing this commit

TranslationItem.Name: showContainedInBranchesToolStripMenuItem
TranslationItem.Source: Show local branches containing this commit

TranslationItem.Source: GitExtensions has insufficient permissions to check the registry.

TranslationItem.Name: _AddEntryManually
CheckoutGB
TranslationItem.Source: Don't ask to confirm to (use with caution)

TranslationItem.Value: 체크아웃이 완료되면 Stash 변경사항이 적용 됩니다 (자동으로 표시됨)

TranslationItem.Name: chkAutoPopStashAfterPull

TranslationItem.Source: Please clone GitHub repository before pull request.

TranslationItem.Source: Could not locate a remote that belongs to your user!

The selected item is not a valid git repository.

TranslationItem.Name: _strategyTooltipText
TranslationItem.Source:
resolve This can only resolve two heads (i.e. the current branch and another branch you pulled from) using a 3-way merge algorithm. It tries to carefully detect criss-cross merge ambiguities and is considered generally safe and fast.
recursive This can only resolve two heads using a 3-way merge algorithm. When there is more than one common ancestor that can be used for 3-way merge, it creates a merged tree of the common ancestors and uses that as the reference tree for the 3-way merge. Additionally this can detect and handle merges involving renames. This is the default merge strategy when pulling or merging one branch.
octopus This resolves cases with more than two heads, but refuses to do a complex merge that needs manual resolution. It is primarily meant to be used for bundling topic branch heads together. This is the default merge strategy when pulling or merging more than one branch.
ours This resolves any number of heads, but the resulting tree of the merge is always that of the current branch head, effectively ignoring all changes from all other branches. It is meant to be used to supersede old development history of side branches.
subtree This is a modified recursive strategy. When merging trees A and B, if B corresponds to a subtree of A, B is first adjusted to match the tree structure of A, instead of reading the trees at the same level. This adjustment is also done to the common ancestor tree.

TranslationItem.Source:
The Gerrit plugin for GitExtensions provides integration with Gerrit for GitExtensions. This plugin has been based on the git-review tool.
To enable Gerrit support for a repository, a .gitreview file must be created. This can be done through the Repository | Edit .gitreview menu option. See the link below for more information on the .gitreview file and the git-review tool.

TranslationItem.Name: label18
TranslationItem.Source: OpenSSH is a commandline tool. PuTTY is more userfriendly to use for windows users, but requires the PuTTY authentication client to run in the background. When OpenSSH is used, command line dialogs are shown!
TranslationItem.Value: OpenSSH는 콘솔명령어 툴입니다. PuTTY가 더 편리한 윈도우 툴입니다. 하지만 PuTTY의 경우 인증을 백그라운드에서 실행 해야합니다. OpenSSH가 사용될 경우, 명령실행창(cmd)이 표시됩니다.

TranslationItem.Name: _strCouldNotAddRemote
TranslationItem.Source: Could not add remote with name {0} and URL {1}

TranslationItem.Name: _strRemoteAlreadyExist
TranslationItem.Source: ERROR: Remote with name {0} already exists but it does not point to the same repository! Details: Is {1} expected {2}
TranslationItem.Value: 오류: 원격 저장소 {0}는 존재하고 있지만, 동일한 저장소가 아닙니다. 세부사항: {1} 는 {2} 로 보임
